Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Awards attorney fees and expert witness fees in appropriate cases
Summary: Awards attorney's fees and expert witness fees in appropriate cases.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to providing for the award of attorney's fees and expert witness fees in appropriate cases
